name: REV - Car Quiz
description:
Do you know everything about cars? Prove your knowledge by winning every round!

A brand new car quiz that contains all kinds of cars, from SUV's to supercars!

✔️The game covers more than 200 different models!
✔️New updates every week!
✔️More gamemodes coming soon!

 --CURRENT GAMEMODES--

⬛️Guess which car has more horsepower;

Photos of two cars will be shown, you have to guess which car makes more power from its factory!

⬛️Guess the car's horsepower;

In a range of 50HP, you have to guess how much power the shown car can make using a slider!

⬛️Guess which car's acceleration is faster;

Photos of two cars will be shown, you have to guess which accelerates faster!

⬛️Guess the car's top speed;

In a range of 15km/h, you have to guess the shown car's top speed using a slider!

⬛️Guess which car is faster (Top Speed);

Photos of two cars will be shown, you have to guess which car's top speed is greater!

⬛️Guess the car's name;

You will be shown a photo of a car, you have to guess which option is correct!
 

Try to win every round and be the king of the road!

If you find anything wrong, please contact us via email and we will fix it!
